name: AZ Advanced Custom Scrollbar
author: AZ Plugins

sections.description:
“AZ Advanced Custom Scrollbar” – is a modern custom scrollbar, which allows you to replace the existing scrollbar of your website by an awesome custom scrollbar. The scrollbar is extremely smooth and consistent in modern browsers and mobile devices, with low resource usage.

See Live Demo

For Support / Suggestion OR any other query. Please feel free to Contact Us Here
We are also available for freelance work. If you have any projects please feel free to contact us. We have extensive experience on WordPress, Elementor & WooCommerce

Features:

  • Plugin & Play
  • Very stylish scrollbars
  • 100% SEO friendly
  • RTL Support
  • Works smoothly without slowing down the website
  • Works with any WordPress theme
  • Compatible with all touch devices: iPad, Android tablets, Window Surface.
  • Compabible with multi-input device (mouse with touch or pen): Window Surface, Chrome Desktop on touch notebook
  • Support for multi-input devices (MSPointer/Pointer support)
  • Custom Vertical and Horizontal Scrolling
  • Tested for all major browsers desktop and mobile versions
  • Scroll speed is customizable
  • Scrollbar has a lot a customizable features
  • Support keyboard navigation (cursor keys, pagup/down keys, home/end keys)
  • Compatible with 2 directions mice: Apple Magic Mouse, Apple Mouser with 2-dir wheel, PC mouse with 2-dir wheel (if browser support it).
  • Unlimited colors
  • Hardware accelerated scroll (where available)
  • Fully integrated with jQuery
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the “AZ Video and Audio Player Addon for Elementor” plugin and get it working.

1) Install

i. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.

ii. Search For “AZ Advanced Custom Scrollbar”.

iii. Install, then Activate it.

OR:

i. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload az-advanced-custom-scrollbar folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

ii. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

2) Configure

i. After activate the plugin. It will replaced the default scrollbar instantly

ii. For customization navigte to “Settings” > “AZ Scrollbar Settings”

iii. Play with the options, Save and relax!
